page.title: 06Two Infant Pupils
page.content: {Anne Farrel}is a pupil in the first infant class and her favourite subject at school is drawing.She has an older sister called Elizabeth.After school she plays with her friend Susie who lives across the road.She plays singing games.{Anne}likes school and is a member of a swimming club.She believes she is a good swimmer and likes Gretna. {Ryan Aitken}is a member of the second infant class.His favourite subject at school is maths.He watches television after school and his favourite programmes are Streethawk and Godzilla.He is not a member of any clubs outside school.{Ryan}enjoys school and thinks Gretna is a great place to stay and wouldn't ever move away.
